channel.title: Pages on Lets Automate It
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Lets Automate It

item.title: Projects
item.description: WriteLogEntry: A PowerShell helper function to create and write information to a log file PowerShell Phishing Response Toolkit: This PowerShell Module is designed to send notifications to hosting companies that host phishing URLs by utilizing the major WHOIS/RDAP Abuse Point of Contact (POC) information CreateProfile: PowerShell Module that uses WINAPI to create system profiles GetGithubRepository: This PowerShell function will download Github files without using Git PoshZD: A PowerShell Module to interact with the ZenDesk ticketing system PSRegistry: A PowerShell Module that replaces the reg commands using the WIN_API POSH-NotifyGroupOwnerManager

item.title: Presentations
item.description: I have included a list below of my previous presentations and any relevant links. This will be continually updated moving forward: Presentation Slides Hunting Phish Kits Basics of Incident Handling Securing Windows with Group Policy Past Presentations Hunting Phish Kits - 2019 DerbyCon SECURING WINDOWS WITH (SOME) GROUP POLICY – 2018 SHOWMECON SECURING WINDOWS WITH (SOME) GROUP POLICY – 2018 BSIDESKC MOTIVATIONS & TACTICS OF PHISHING – 2017 MORENET ANNUAL CONFERENCE SECURING WINDOWS WITH GROUP POLICY – 2017 DERBYCON BASICS OF INCIDENT RESPONSE – 2017 BSIDESSTL (2) HALF DAY POWERSHELL TRAINING COURSE FOR 80+ - 2017 MU VET MED PPRT: POWERSHELL PHISHING RESPONSE TOOLKIT – 2016 SHOWMECON PPRT: POWERSHELL PHISHING RESPONSE TOOLKIT – 2016 CIRCLE CITY CON SECURING WINDOWS WITH GROUP POLICY – 2015 MORENET ANNUAL CONFERENCE

item.title: About
item.description: Josh’s primary focus is in Windows security and PowerShell automation. He is a GIAC Certified Windows Security Administrator (GCWN) and GIAC Certified Forensic Analyst (GCFA). You can reach Josh at MSAdministrator.com or on Twitter at @MS_dministrator.
